name: HKScrollingNavAndTabBar
summary: An easy to use library that manages hiding and showing of navigation bar, tab bar or toolbar when user scrolls.
description:
An easy to use library that manages hiding and showing of navigation bar, tab bar or toolbar when user scrolls.
More detail you can see source:https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/HKScrollingNavAndTabBar.
